data.title: Rotech Healthcare
data.meta_description: Rotech is a national provider of ventilators, home oxygen therapy, sleep apnea treatment, negative pressure wound therapy, wound care supplies, & home medical equipment.

We are Rotech Healthcare.

connected care helping patients

live a more comfortable life at home

When you choose Rotech Healthcare, you’re choosing more than a home respiratory and medical supplier. You’re choosing neighbors and friends who provide outstanding connected care and high-quality medical products, prioritize clinical excellence, and help you live a more comfortable life. You’re choosing the feel of a hometown company with all the advantages of a national provider.

Our comprehensive selection of home medical equipment and services means you can rest assured that we’re ready to meet your needs. We dedicate ourselves to partnering with your medical team and empowering you to manage your health in the comfort of your own home. At Rotech, we believe respiratory and medical equipment should improve your life, not limit it.

Patient Connected Care

Value-Based Care Programs

Slide

Evaluation and assessment to assist with early identification and intervention for falls, home environment issues, desaturating oxygen levels and CO2 retention.

Slide

Setting COPD patients up for success with individualized care, monitoring, data collection, and targeted follow-ups to avoid 30-day hospital readmissions

Slide

Ongoing support and resources for non-invasive ventilation patients to help them stay compliant and get the most out of NIV therapy

Slide

Improving CPAP compliance rates and quality of life by helping patients get the most out of sleep therapy – and a better night’s sleep

Rotech has really stepped up in the most challenging time most of us have seen in healthcare. When other companies are telling us what they don’t do, Rotech is evolving and quickly creating new processes to meet the needs of the patient.

- RN Care Management Liaison

I wanted to let you know how amazing and helpful Ray was. He went above and beyond to help my father after his lung surgery. Ray was kind and pleasant even at a time when we were all stressed out and having a hard time making decisions.

- A Satisfied Patient's Family

I wanted to let you know what an amazing job Tiara does. She is always professional and very knowledgeable. She takes such good care of me and I appreciate everything she does for my medical needs and equipment. I don’t know what I would do without her. She is truly a very valuable member of your team.

- A happy patient in Texas

I was connected to Landan and he was superb while reflecting a high degree of knowledge, professionalism, and patience, even kindness in dealing with me. I was once the head of an organization employing over 2,000 people and I know the importance of hiring good people. This is what Rotech has done in hiring Landan; he is a keeper and I wish him and Rotech well in the future.

- From a satisfied patient in Kentucky

- From a patient in South Carolina

It was such a pleasure to have this young man, perfectly attired for, and so very kind and respectful of the entire transition for my mother from a regular bed to hospital bed. He is truly an asset to your company and comfort during these difficult seasons of life as well as the Covid situation.

- From a patient’s family in North Carolina
